paragraphs.body: Korra: Making of a Legend is a series of short commentaries by the creators of ${link_0}, ${link_1} and ${link_2}, on each ${link_3} of Book One: Air. It was broadcast during the commercial breaks of the re-airing of the series on Nicktoons from July 9 to July 20, 2012.
paragraphs.text: Korra: Making of a Legend is a series of short commentaries by the creators of The Legend of Korra, Bryan Konietzko and Michael Dante DiMartino, on each episode of Book One: Air. It was broadcast during the commercial breaks of the re-airing of the series on Nicktoons from July 9 to July 20, 2012.

paragraphs.body: [Clip of Korra trying and failing to firebend.] You see for the first time Korra kind of losing her confidence, she's freaking out. [Clip of Korra and mako entering the Equalist rally, pans out to show the interior of the rally building.] It was a great way for her to see "Whoa this is this whole underground resistance, sorta where they're training this so ..." [Clip of an Equalist motorcycle.] And, motorcycles.
